channel.title: Ravers' Fantasy 317 Server download! F2p, with Qp System, custom quests, + more!
channel.description:
I'm re-writing this because my safari closed for no reason when I was near done with posting.
Im not gonna post all the pics I did before because most links are lost due to ^^. I really didn't want to release this, but I'm doing it for the community...
Server: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ynknjimmkl2]Download from: Mediafire[/url]
Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3ngmxojgtid]Download from: Mediafire[/url]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/rcr4fb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/8z06bq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/i6ciyq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2khiiw.jpg[/img]
Some features:
- Dupes/bugs fixed
- City teleport added
- New right click context menus
- Monks low-level training
- Added moss giant training area
- Rune 2h combos work
- A great economy if you host it
- When smithing a bar, you will get a random item. So: Smith a bronze bar, you get a random bronze armour/weapon etc... Pretty cool ^^ :D
- Qp system 75%, for some reason it doesn't add up when you finish the quest? :(
- Added cook's assistant quest (perfected)
- Dumped all lumbridge npcs 100% in their correct spots!
- Removed all ways to obtain members objects
- more!
I have to thank Karl' for his great client work, he really did a good job.
Server Credits: Me (pk3r john) Some tutorials
Client Credits: 100% karl'
Thanks.. I hope you download because I really worked a long time on this, sitting for hours trying to figure stuff out. And yes this is F2p, so no mems items or anything.
*Clicks Post*

item.title: Ravers' Fantasy 317 Server download! F2p, with Qp System, custom quests, + more!
item.dc:creator: @karl1 karl`
item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

the pictures some more.
[center]

dpxqno.jpg767×502


[/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 07:24:44 am[/size][hr][size=34pt]PLEASE NOTE:BAD ENGLISH AS IM TIRED AND I WAS THAT STUPID I WROTE IT ALL IN GERMAN NOT ENGLISH[/size]
[hr]
[center]WebClient Release[/center]

All the files are found in Upload.
[hr]
[center]edit the client(without compiling)[/center]
[hr]
(1)
open “index.html” in the “Upload” folder
You will see stuff like this

<html> 
<head> 
  <script language=javascript> 
alert("This is a BETA webclient things are subject to change");
</script> 
  <meta 
 content="text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1"
 http-equiv="content-type"> 
  <title>Raver's fantasy webclient</title> 
  <meta content="karl` of moparscape"
 name="author"> 
  <meta content="karl09.co.cc/raver/"
 name="description"> 
</head> 
<body 
 style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(2, 2, 2);"
 alink="#000099" link="#000099" vlink="#990099"> 
<applet name="client"
 archive="loader.jar" code="client.class" height="503"
 width="765"> <param 
 name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx700m"> <param 
 name="server_name" value="Raver" s="" fantasy=""><param 
 name="detail" value="low"> 
<param name="ip"
 value="raversfantasyserv.no-ip.org"> <param 
 name="port" value="43594"> <param 
 name="background_image"
 value="http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/3188/backgroundobt.png"><param 
 name="headicons" value="Pk"></applet> 
</body> 
</noscript> 
<div style="text-align: center;"><div style="position:relative; top:0; margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto; z-index:99999"> 
<!-- Start of StatCounter Code --> 
 <script type="text/javascript"> 
 var sc_project=4828498; 
 var sc_invisible=1; 
 var sc_partition=54; 
 var sc_click_stat=1; 
 var sc_security="7b4a84ec"; 
 </script> 
 
 <script type="text/javascript"
 src="http://www.statcounter.com/counter/counter_xhtml.js"></script><noscript><div
 class="statcounter"><a title="wordpress stats "
 class="statcounter"
 href="http://www.statcounter.com/wordpress.org/"><img
 class="statcounter"
 src="http://c.statcounter.com/4828498/0/7b4a84ec/1/"
 alt="wordpress stats " /></a></div></noscript> 
 <!-- End of StatCounter Code --> 
</div></div> 
</html>

ok all we need to change is the[code]

[/code] explaning [hr] [code] name="server_name" value="Raver" s="" fantasy=""><param [/code] just change "Raver" "fantasy to your server name. [hr] Changing the IP [code] <param [/code] that is the ip change it to wat ever you need it to be.

PORT CHANGING

 name="port" value="43594"> <param

CHange the “43594” to the port you need.
[hr]
CHANGING THE CLIENT BACKGROUND

value="http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/3188/backgroundobt.png"><param

place your Background url in the spot.

That basicly covers it.

Read full topic

@pk3r_john wrote:

I’m re-writing this because my safari closed for no reason when I was near done with posting.

Im not gonna post all the pics I did before because most links are lost due to ^^.
I really didn’t want to release this, but I’m doing it for the community…

Server:
Download from: Mediafire

Client:
Download from: Mediafire

Pictures:

Some features:

  • Dupes/bugs fixed

  • City teleport added

  • New right click context menus

  • Monks low-level training

  • Added moss giant training area

  • Rune 2h combos work

  • A great economy if you host it

  • When smithing a bar, you will get a random item. So:
    Smith a bronze bar, you get a random bronze armour/weapon
    etc… Pretty cool ^^

  • Qp system 75%, for some reason it doesn’t add up when you finish the quest?

  • Added cook’s assistant quest (perfected)

  • Dumped all lumbridge npcs 100% in their correct spots!

  • Removed all ways to obtain members objects

  • more!

I have to thank Karl’ for his great client work, he really did a good job.

Server Credits:
Me (pk3r john)
Some tutorials

100% karl’

Thanks… I hope you download because I really worked a long time on this, sitting for hours trying to figure stuff out. And yes this is F2p, so no mems items or anything.
